entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
